content: For each question, choose the correct answer

Red Pandas

Red pandas live in Nepal, Northern Myanmar, India and Bhutan, as (19) _________ as in China. They (20) _________ a lot of their time in trees and are very (21) _________ at climbing. They are more active during the night than the day, and they usually (22) _________ for food in the evening and early in the morning. Their favourite food is bamboo. In fact, a female red panda can eat 20,000 bamboo leaves in a day! But they also eat fruit, grass, eggs, insects and (23) _________ small birds and animals. Scientists believe that the number of red pandas in the world is (24) _________ because the forests where they live are getting smaller. But much is being done in countries around the world to help this amazing animal.
